channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Wellness Wednesdays Continue January 29
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM - A program dedicated to enhancing student health and well-being, Wellness Wednesdays offer a diverse range of activities and information sessions that focus on crucial life skills and aim to equip students with practical knowledge for maintaining physical, mental, and financial wellness throughout their college journey and beyond.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Understanding the US Taxes System” Session Being Offered as Part of Spring Graduate Lunch and Learn Series
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Please join Michael Jackstadt and Mark Moran for an insightful seminar on taxes, and how they work for students. Lunch will be served from 12-12:30; please note that seating is limited for this hybrid event.
item.author: Students

item.title: Lally Accelerated Eng/Sci + MBA Program Info Session Scheduled for January 29
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Are you interested in saving time and money by getting your MBA in an accelerated program? Register to attend this session to learn more about the new Accelerated Engineering/Science + MBA Program, which allows Rensselaer engineering and science undergraduates to complete their Bachelor’s degree within eight or fewer semesters.
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Away Semester Reflection to be Held January 29
item.description: Join the CCPD, OUE, and Student Success on Wednesday, January 29 from 4pm to 6pm in DCC 318 to celebrate and reflect on students’ arch away experience from Spring, Summer, or Fall 2024! If your arch away experience is approaching, attend to hear from other students about what they did and how it benefitted them. Faculty and staff are also encouraged to attend!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Analytics, Machine Learning, AI Review
item.description: Date: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., as he highlights Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning & AI. Attendees will learn how data can inform better decisions, and review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand.
item.author: Community

item.title: Multimedia Services Announces Webex App Support Policy Enforcement
item.description: In early February, the Webex desktop app will release an update to version 45.2, and at that time versions 44.4 and older — as well as Windows 10 versions prior to version 1809 — will no longer be supported by the Webex desktop app. All members of the Rensselaer community are asked to ensure that their Webex desktop app is up-to-date with the most current version for the best Webex experience.
item.author: Community

item.title: RPIrates Monthly Meeting, “Put Your Data on Maps with Leaflet in R!,” to be Held January 29
item.description: RPI R users are invited to meeting of RPIrates, the RPI R Users Group! This week’s topic will be “Put Your Data on Maps with Leaflet in R!,” led by Dr. John S. Erickson, Director of Research Operations of the Future of Computing Institute (FOCI) at Rensselaer. The session will discuss how R’s Leaflet package makes it easy for users to create interactive maps that present data analyses in powerful, compelling, geographically-relevant ways.
item.author: Community

item.title: Computer Science Colloquia, “Debugging Programs for School, Fun, and Profit,” Scheduled for January 31
item.description: Date: Friday, January 31, 2025 4:30 PM - 6:00 PM - In this seminar, RPI’s current Hacker-in-Residence Jeremy Blackthorne will show better ways to debug that you need to know using ChatGPT, as well as cover free tools for debugging, tracing, and profiling like VS Code, Ghidra, IDA Free, and various other command line utilities like ltrace, strace, latrace, gprof, and more!
item.author: Community

item.title: Be a Part of the Spirit Day Photo on January 31!
item.description: Date: Friday, January 31, 2025 11:15 AM - 11:30 AM - Don’t forget to wear your best RPI gear and meet at the Union Horseshoe this Friday for the Annual Spirit Day photo!
item.author: Community

item.title: Fidelity Offering Confidential Retirement Consultation by Phone, Zoom Video Option January 28
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to help you become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
